name: LoLItemSetCreator
description: Create LoL ItemSet with the Champion.GG API

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ | electron-packager . LoLItemSetCreator --platform win32,mas,darwin --arch x64,ia32 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.setup: electron-installer-windows --src dist/LoLItemSetCreator-win32-ia32/ --dest dist/installers/win/32bit | electron-installer-windows --src dist/LoLItemSetCreator-win32-x64/ --dest dist/installers/win/64bit
scripts.zip: 7z a -t7z dist/packages/darwin_x64.7z dist/LoLItemSetCreator-darwin-x64/ | 7z a -t7z dist/packages/mas_x64.7z dist/LoLItemSetCreator-mas-x64/

author: PrimuS
